**Request for Proposal RFP-001761: Specialty Risk Insurance Benefits Programme**

**Notice Details**

*   **Title:** Specialty Risk Insurance Benefits Programme
*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01022051
*   **Publication Date:** January 19, 2023
*   **Closes:** March 1, 2023 at 10:00 AM EST
*   **Contracting Entity:** Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
*   **Contact:** Daniela Michaud, 613-740-4203, Dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca

**Description**

The Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation is seeking a specialty risk insurance benefits provider to offer a turnkey solution to our employees, retirees, spouses, and children. The successful proponent must provide the following three benefit categories: Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D) Insurance, Critical Illness (CI) Insurance, and Business Travel Accident (BTA) Insurance, including Business Travel Medical (BTM). The contract will have an initial term of three years with two one-year extension options, totaling up to five years.

**Information Package**

Please find the information package attached:

*   [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/19/f792bf4b05593e3528191b2b42b20bb8/rfp-001761_specialty_risk_insurances_en.pdf)
*   [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/19/570701a8b80c9b4d9fce98faf0beef71/rfp-001761_specialty_risk_insurances_fr.pdf)

**Attachments**

The following attachments are available:

*   **Appendix B: Pricing Form** (English)
*   **Appendix B: Pricing Form** (French)
*   **Appendix D: Form of Agreement** (English)
*   **Appendix D: Form of Agreement** (French)

We recommend contacting the Contracting Officer prior to submitting your proposal. The Contracting Officer will provide you with information on the tender and specify any additional requirements. To confirm the submission of your proposal, please contact [Dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:Dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca) once you have submitted your proposal.
